title: #1476 Statistically It's Nothing, Emotionally It's Huge
itunes:title: #1476 Statistically It's Nothing, Emotionally It's Huge
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Drew revealing that just last night he spoke with and attempted to book Love Boat alumnus Ted Lange.  They then turn to the phones and speak with a variety of callers on topics from dog strollers to navigating critical race theory in the educational realm and more. They also speak with a caller who was recently infected with Covid and is looking for Dr. Drew's most up to date advice on treating the disease.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
JustWorks.com
